deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: ★Built-in 400 Super Classic Games：Built-in 400 retro games console , Take you back to the fun of your childhood.If You find the scratches on The screen after receving the game console，Just Tear Off The Screen Protection Film.

★Rechargeable battery：Portable Game Console built-in 1020mAh Rechargeable lithium battery. Never worry about changing battery while electricity runs out. The game can play for up to 5 hours each time it is fully charged.

★Support for Play on TV：There is a AV output cable and lovely gamepad so that you can connect the game consoles to TV and then enjoy the lively on the big screen. More importantly, it can also exercise children's thinking and logical ability. In the game clearance success, it also can bring the children full of confidence.

★Portable and Trendy：Compact and light weight video game handheld with simple and never outdated design, suitable for carry it to anywhere at anytime. The perfect choice for enjoying childhood fun in airplanes, camps, travel or on the way to work.

★Perfect gifts for boys girls and adult ：Simple arcade style and easy to play. A perfect companion to promote our kids' eyehand coordination abilities. It is a surprise birthday/Christmas present for your kids and anybody who love the old school games.
body.description: Game Console , classic game console , handheld game console, retro game console with 400 classic games, gift Birthday Christmas Presents for kids, Adults There is a protective film on the screen, you may take it off when you the get the retro game console. Handheld Video Game Console Poduct Introduction: Screen: 2.8 Inch TFT Built-in:400 games Languages: English and Chinese Speaker: Yes Working time: 5 hours Battery:1020 mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery Portable Game Console Note: 1.Before connect to a TV.make sure that your TV and the unit are turned off. 2.turn the channel on TV to the Audio/Video channel. 3.This game console does not have the function of saving the progress of the game. When you quit the game, all progress will be zero. 4,Please read the instructions carefully before use! Battery Notice: 1.Do not short circuit battery contacts 2.Do not dispose of batteries in fire 3.Remove the batteries from the unit if sit will not be used for an extended period of the time. Accessories : 1 x Red Retro FC game console 1 x User manual 1 x AV Cable 1 x USB Cable 1x rechargeable battery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of fun
reviews.reviewText: Lots of games to keep you busy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neat but super bootleg status
reviews.reviewText: This isn’t a legit product in any way. It’s super bootleg like you would find at a drugstore.Okay putting that aside it’s pretty neat. I bought it for my 6 year old to play in the car. He loves it.It charges with a micro usb connector from a standard phone charger. There is no charge indicator so just plug it in for 3 hours and it should be full. We charge it after every 2-3 hours he uses it but not because it’s really needed, it’s just to be safe because we can’t tell the charge level.The screen is decent and the sound is okay. It gets pretty loud. Haven’t tested headphones or anything else with it. It’s mainly a car toy or for use when we are out to dinner. It’s small and easy to toss in a pocket or bag.Look it’s a neat trip down memory lane but that’s it. It’s one of those buy it and toss it if it breaks. You can have fun with it but it won’t break the bank if it dies in a year. Don’t expect full blown $300 game console quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nephew loved it
reviews.reviewText: Sooooo cool!! So many games!! Works great. My nephew loves it. What a deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No save feature, but…
reviews.reviewText: So people are complaining about no save feature, but that’s exactly how it worked back in the day. The biggest issue I have, thus far, is the number of games uploaded. There are not 400 games. If you hold down the down arrow it takes you to the end of the list where you start seeing games repeated. Keep that in mind. For the price, I think it’s a good little gadget for my kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars White Screen, no picture
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter's birthday. After 10min of playing with it the screen went white. The sound still works, you can hear the characters moving but there is no picture on the screen. Very disappointing, she was very excited to get this present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: It was a gift and liked it a lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for the family.
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my grandson. His parents remember the music. So I got them each a game. Now they have races.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool Retro Games
reviews.reviewText: This little game system has several retro nes games. I'm not sure if it really has 400 games as a few seem to be listed several times, but I haven't yet been through the entire catalog and played them to see differences. The ones I have played worked as they should. My only real complaint is that the progress doesn't save.
I bought two of these for children I don’t know . Most people buy for the little ones but the 11-14 yr olds don’t get much . I thought these would be perfect for them .
